label: Generate security data
command: cd $KIBANA_HOME/x-pack/solutions/security/plugins/security_solution && yarn test:generate --related 500 && curl --location 'http://elastic:changeme@localhost:5601/api/detection_engine/rules' --header 'kbn-xsrf: cypress-creds' --header 'Content-Type: application/json'  --header 'elastic-api-version: 2023-10-31' --data '{"type": "query","query": "*","index": ["apm-*-transaction*","auditbeat-*","endgame-*","filebeat-*","logs-*","packetbeat-*","traces-apm*","winlogbeat-*","-*elastic-cloud-logs-*"],"name": "Custom","description": "The new rule description.","severity": "high","risk_score": 17,"interval": "1m","from": "now-50000h"}'

label: Generate security data (serverless)
command: cd $KIBANA_HOME/x-pack/solutions/security/plugins/security_solution --node http://elastic_serverless:changeme@localhost:9200 --kibana http://elastic_serverless:changeme@localhost:5601 && yarn test:generate --related 500 && curl --location 'http://elastic_serverless:changeme@localhost:5601/api/detection_engine/rules' --header 'kbn-xsrf: cypress-creds' --header 'Content-Type: application/json'  --header 'elastic-api-version: 2023-10-31' --data '{"type": "query","query": "*","index": ["apm-*-transaction*","auditbeat-*","endgame-*","filebeat-*","logs-*","packetbeat-*","traces-apm*","winlogbeat-*","-*elastic-cloud-logs-*"],"name": "Custom","description": "The new rule description.","severity": "high","risk_score": 17,"interval": "1m","from": "now-50000h"}'
